stories.text:
Hi all,
We are launching the beta version of a robotics community website on 1st August 2021. If you feel you can help us with your feedback & suggestions, we would love to hear from you through this form. We will stay in touch for further detail. Form: https://bit.ly/betatrt 
Thanks.
stories.title: Beta Testers
“Beijing One Pass” Employee Benefits Software Exhibits Spyware Characteristics
Some fun stats from the Google interview

stories.text:
Recently I've noticed that my Google results for (notably) technical topics have gotten __significantly__ worse.

Websites riddled with ads to the point of unreadability. It feels that we've regressed into the BonziBuddy/Pop-up era of the Internet, but now it's EVERYWHERE.

I've made a video to illustrate what I mean: https://youtu.be/a9nka506PEM

Is it just me or have you also had similar experience?
